document: DESIGN AND CHARACTERIZATION OF ZEOLITE SUPPORTED COBALT CARBONYL CATALYSTS by Melissa Clare Connaway Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in Chemistry APPROVED: B. E. Hanson, Chairman J. G. Dillard J. P. Wightman J. M. Tanko M. E. Davis July, 1987 Blacksburg, Virginia
